# Soul rot
## Overview
**Type:** disease, special

**Save:** Fortitude DC 23

**Onset:** 1d8 days

**Frequency:** 

**Effect:** 1d6 Wis, 1d6 Cha

**Cure:** 

Creatures that eat the flesh of an evil outsider can contract this horrible malady. Soul rot eats at the victimâ€™s mind and soul until she dies a horrible, agonizing death full of pain and misery.

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness, pg. 32
